content:
So we discussed in the T-compiler meeting today the idea of having "per working group" directories. I went ahead and created a rough template, which you can view here:

https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/tree/master/working-groups

This contains three files:

  • README.md -- basic info about the working group
  • FAQ.md -- some common questions etc, expected to be updated over time
  • NOTES.md -- a place to log the weekly triage and check-in, perhaps needs a better name
